articles.title: New concept for rocket thruster exploits the mechanism behind solar flares - Nanowerk
articles.description: A new type of rocket thruster that could take humankind to Mars and beyond has been proposed by a physicist. The device would apply magnetic fields to cause particles of plasma to shoot out the back of a rocket and propel the craft forward.
